ID0EC
Begin forwarded message:
From: "Salvador, Christine" <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Subject: FW: Unitron festive season social campaign posts
Date: 9 December 2021 at 10:09:49 am AEDT
To: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Hi Heath,

Hope you are well!

Can you please add the items in the link below to Nikki's local area marketing section in unitronmarketing.com.au

https://sonova-my.sharepoint.com/:u:/p/nikki_ozeken/Ea2WeEOrqFtDmoQEmDtCiKYBYX9SVuIvuvzBRy7CAskWWA?e=ZXCqTT

Thank you,

Christine

From: Ozeken, Nikki
Sent: Wednesday, 8 December 2021 6:17 PM
To: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Subject: RE: Unitron festive season social campaign posts

No still unresolved 😊

This is the latest response! They just don't get it. Can you have Heath add them to the marketing catalogue and link to the links from the catalogue? That's the safest option at the moment.

Hello, Nikki Ozeken! It seems like we have reached our limit of sharing, best option I can suggest is we make another copy of the files and let the new users that you'll be adding be on the new copy of files. Let me know if this works for you. Regards, Melanie

Nikki Ozeken

Customer Marketing and VAS Manager

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest

NSW 2153 Australia
Phone: +61 2 8858 1841
Mobile: +61 427 017 997
E-Mail: nikki.ozeken@sonova.com

Internet: www.phonak.com.au

Sent: Wednesday, 8 December 2021 5:30 PM
To: Ozeken, Nikki <Nikki.Ozeken@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Unitron festive season social campaign posts

Hi Nikki,

Have they got back to you about the file sharing?

Thank you,

Christine

To: Ozeken, Nikki <Nikki.Ozeken@sonova.com>
Subject: RE: Unitron festive season social campaign posts

Hi Nikki,

It opens there, but not sure how I can share this one uNews? Did you want all the other tabs in that spreadsheet to be accessed too and all the other images?

Thanks,

Christine

From: Ozeken, Nikki
Sent: Tuesday, 7 December 2021 4:58 PM
To: Salvador, Christine <Christine.Salvador@unitron.com>
Subject: RE: Unitron festive season social campaign posts

Not sure what's going on with One Drive, people have been having trouble accessing and downloading files?

Have you tried accessing directly the folder in the drive?

Christine

Subject: Unitron festive season social campaign posts

Hi Guys,

Here are the Unitron festive season social campaign posts that I'll be sharing with the reps this Friday https://sonova-my.sharepoint.com/:u:/p/nikki_ozeken/Ea2WeEOrqFtDmoQEmDtCiKYBGbYf51E-CoLdshTWm0LjwQ?e=s88NcQ

Christine will share the file in the next UNews. The reps can also send onto their customers as they wish. A great chance to use as a tool to touch base with their customers.

I am also finalising the campaigns guide and supporting materials and hope to have them to you both for review tomorrow COB.

Thanks.

Nikki Ozeken
